title: Main Languages
desc: HTML CSS and Javascript Front to back including ES6 syntax & REST api, npm, Typescript, with basic familiarity in jQuer, SASS and PHP.

title: Frameworks
desc: Hands on libraries and frameworks like React.js, Redux, Angular Bootstrap, and Node.js the Javascript Runtime Environment for the backend.

title: Responsive Design
desc: For me website that is !responisve is !professional, Therefor I use native CSS or bootstrap to make my websites fully responsive for all devices.

title: Tools & Apps
desc: Git and Github, Docker, MongoDB for managing DBs & Adobe Photoshop, XD, Figma for design + hands on web builders like wordpress and elementor.
